name: Swift Obsidian Greataxe
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Orcs/New Racial Rules/Half-Orc Magic Items/Swift Obsidian Greataxe

Construction.Requirements: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, expeditious retreat, keen edge

sections.body: The blade of this +1 keen greataxe is carved from jet-black obsidian. When the wielder charges an enemy, he receives a +10 foot enhancement bonus to his speed that round. Once per day, he can command the axe to grant all allies within 30 feet a +10 foot enhancement bonus to base speed for 1 round.
sections.name: Description
